00136 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00137 {
00138     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00139 
00140     if ( globalThresholdingTime_.get() != 0 )
00141         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_.get();
00142 
00143     if ( templateFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00144         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_.get();
00145 
00146     if ( averagingFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00147         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_.get();
00148 
00149     if ( thinningTime_.get() != 0 )
00150         totalTime_ += *thinningTime_.get();
00151 
00152     if ( segmentationTime_.get() != 0 )
00153         totalTime_ += *segmentationTime_.get();
00154 
00155     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_.get() != 0 )
00156         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_.get();
00157 };
